snippet: HIRSCH--Theodore "Ted." Dearest Ted, forever a deep part of our lives, you will always be in our hearts. Love from all the Emmerichs...

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HIRSCH, THEODORE "TED." DEAREST TED

lead_paragraph: HIRSCH--Theodore "Ted." Dearest Ted, forever a deep part of our lives, you will always be in our hearts. Love from all the Emmerichs
